website_summaries.verdict: Featuring a wide assortment of delicious and nutrient-packed pieces made especially for parakeets, Fiesta is a buffet of flavors, textures, and colors that even the pickiest of eaters will fall in love with.
pros: Millet, canary grass seed, and oats are the first 3 ingredients
Wide variety of tasty and healthy foods, including papaya, coconut, and carrots
cons: While Fiesta uses real bits of nutritious vegetables and fruits, it also uses artificial food colorings

customer_reviews.title: Possibly caused liver issues in our parakeet
customer_reviews.text: Started using this seed for our parakeets, thinking it was a better brand - after two months or so of using it, one of our parakeets started with extremely fast overgrowth of his beak - had to take him to get it trimmed twice. The vet suggested it may be a liver issue caused by an extremely fatty seed mix. Thankfully we feed them lots of fruits and veggies - if they ate seed only, it could have been much worse. We switched to a very high quality well known brand and the beak growth stopped. Firmly convinced this seed brand was responsible. I do not recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey M.

customer_reviews.title: Will Kill Your Bird - Contaminated
customer_reviews.text: I have an American Parakeet. One day after feeding him this food he almost died. I took the bird and food to the vet. The vet said the food was contaminated and not any good for the bird to eat. I had to pay $85 in vet bills and the bird is still in bad condition. I might have to put him down in the next day or two. PLEASE DO NOT FEED YOUR PARAKEET OR ANY BIRD THIS FEED. I had to give it to vet so no animals would eat it from the trash. DEADLY.
customer_reviews.author: German

customer_reviews.title: package arrived with a hole in the bottom
customer_reviews.text: The bag of bird seed had a fairly large hole in the bottom so worried about safely feeding to my bird. This is the second package of bird seed I received this week with a hole in the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nugent

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, tastes good! (to my birds of course)
customer_reviews.text: My parakeets seem to really love this food! The seed came just as pictured in the photo. It contains a great blend of fruits and veggies. The various shapes and sizes of each piece of the food make it more interesting and enriching for my birds. I have noticed that for some reason, there is one specific piece that they usually just throw on the ground, which is the flat yellow piece. I am not sure why they do not like that piece, but they enjoy everything else, and birds are bound to be picky about something! I use this as a supplemental addition to their diet for nutrition and enrichment.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My birds do not prefer this seed
customer_reviews.text: This seed mix is not up to my standards, nor my birds' standards. They scratch through it trying to find specific seeds or bits and, consequently, there is a lot of wasted seed on the bottom of the cage.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1928

customer_reviews.title: My bird threw away most of the food and only ...
customer_reviews.text: My bird threw away most of the food and only picked out the actual seeds to eat. She usually loves Kaytee products but this one was a no-go for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped bag on arrival
customer_reviews.text: The bag of bird food was ripped and I had to scoop half the bird food out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Aida tappan

customer_reviews.title: A Little of Everything Good!
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 5 stars because it has a little bit of everything in it. Everything birds should love, just not my two parakeets. They only want seed and nothing else. So when they have eaten their seed, I throw the rest of the contents outside and the finches and sparrows and mourning doves love it. So this is a great product and the birds love it, just not my two that insist on seed alone. If I ever get other parakeets, I will try this again because I know it is a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Amazon not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed too much money for this seed, my birds don’t care for the seed lots of uneaten seed at the bottom of the cage. The bag I received was infested with Pantry moths will not purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. TVJR

customer_reviews.title: Good product but bag opened in one corner
customer_reviews.text: One of the bags was opened when it arrived, seed all over. Second bag was fine. This is my third order in a row where one of the bags is open. I only order here for convenience but I think it’s poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Mel V

customer_reviews.title: They say it expires after 1.5 mos.
customer_reviews.text: My birds like it but they say it's only fresh for 1.5 mos so I'll have to throw the rest away as it only comes in a 5 pound bag. I only have 2 parakeets and they don't eat that much in that amount of time. So I have today bought another brand that has 2.5 pound bags. I need a smaller bag that will stay fresh. I think I just bought Vitacraft.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth DuBelko

customer_reviews.title: KAYTEE YOU MAKE MY BABIES PARAKEETS BELLY HAPPY..
customer_reviews.text: Kaytee has become my ultimate favorite brand there's nothing my babies parakeets don't like about kaytee.. Thank you kaytee.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M.

customer_reviews.title: My Parakeet(Pauly) is singing more than ever!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly and so far my parakeet is loving it. He seems to enjoy this better than the old food because it has dried fruits and vegetables included already. Plus the super bonus is that the 4.5Lb. Bag is literally $10.00 cheaper than in the big box stores like pets mart or any of those guys. Good job again Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Biggzo

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and easy with a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I would usually have to go to a pet store to buy this food, but it's so easy to order online and have it delivered the next day. Price is the same or less expensive than the box stores and my parakeets are happy because they aren't getting a dull, bland diet food!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks good..
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this for our 11 year old parakeet trying to get them into the variety is this something new for him so I hope he likes it. Didn't add anything for flavor cuz I didn't taste it as it is for pets not human consumption but we shall see if my pet likes it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice mix of seed and pellet
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that since I order once a month a few times the seed bag was broken and seed was all over the box. It should not be placed in the same box as heavier items.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Napolitano

customer_reviews.title: My birds love it
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tasted it but by the way my birds scarf it down I'm assuming it tastes pretty yummy.
customer_reviews.author: randy c.

customer_reviews.title: A "NO" for my birds.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my 2 Parakeets didn't like this food, and each time I filled their feeder they would peck, and throw it out onto the cage floor, and even out of their cage onto my floor. They rebelled, and made huge messes w/ this seed.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good but my budgies don't seem to like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Since putting a bit of this in my budgies' daily mix, I've for the first time seen one of them picking stuff up and throwing it out. If they adjust to it in a few weeks, I'll post an update. EDIT: Changing to 4 stars since I mixed it with 2 other kinds of mixes and budgie throwing food out behavior has stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Birds don’t like part of the food
customer_reviews.text: My parakeets always throw the large pieces and wheat seed that may too large and too hard for them.

customer_reviews.title: Moth larvae in the seed.
customer_reviews.text: Good bird seed, but it had moth larvae in it! I won’t order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kari E. Gronros

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect for parakeets! 😄
customer_reviews.text: My parakeets love this mix. They have really small seed. I would suggest buying this seed mix for small parrots. The seeds are way to small for big macaws and African parrots. Although there were a few seeds in there that were to big for my parrot’s beak and sometimes they don’t eat it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good Product
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be good quality food. My parakeets are picky eaters and sometimes they just toss it all over the floor. Smells fresh, and fruity. I would recommend if you're trying to avoid the pet store.
customer_reviews.author: M. D.

customer_reviews.title: Healthier.
customer_reviews.text: High quality food and my birdies love the mixture of ingredients. Great value. Will buy again and again.

customer_reviews.title: Picky parakeet only picks out the seeds, so not ...
customer_reviews.text: Picky parakeet only picks out the seeds, so not sure he is actually getting the vitamins and minerals he needs from this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bag arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Birds liked but package arrived with bag broken. Lost 1/3 of bag of seed in mailing box. Messy! Would suggest packing in separate bags rather than just throwing them into box.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: My birds love it, but...
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good and fresh. My birds even know how the bag looks, they get excited when I showed to them. I just want to let you know that this is my second time buying this food, and both bags have been delivered with a tiny hole. The seeds were draining through. First time I thought it was a mistake, now I am suspicious.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: Fresh
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy these seeds for my 12 year old love bird. He's getting old so he needed a smaller seed. I'm happy to see him eating more and enjoying his seeds.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased a parakeet and this food came with the cage. When we were close to running out, we went back to the store. Prices were double or more than here on Amazon. My bird is happy and I’m happy. He loves this food and his poop is not watery. Good solid droppings, LOL😊
customer_reviews.author: Love2Shop

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t taste it yet (jp) but my bird love it. The bag is bigger than I expected which is great. The price is okay. For now i will stick to buying this.

customer_reviews.title: My birds would not eat this.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is wrong with this food, because I am not a bird. But neither of my parakeets who usually love Kaytee food will eat this food. They will not touch it!!! I had to put it out for the outside birds. It had a funny smell when I smelled it, like a strange seed in it.

customer_reviews.title: Good for my Parakeets
customer_reviews.text: Good for my Parakeets. He seems to like this food, but there are few things he won't eat. A lot of food for a good price.

customer_reviews.title: Great base food, good to add interest with pellets

I typically have trouble getting the bag to seal, but there are easy ways around that. This is a great inexpensive product that your budgies are likely to love.

customer_reviews.title: Get Fiesta Food for your pet birds.
customer_reviews.text: I’m feeding them now with this Fiesta food. They’re parakeets and they eat it. The chips are big and can get caught in a feeding tube, so I recommend using a feeding tray instead.

customer_reviews.title: Best price offer and Last longer.
customer_reviews.text: First off the price was just great for me. A 2 pound cost the same at the pet store and it did even last a month for my two little ones. this bag is last longer than I expected, had it for two months going on to three and the bag if half empty. The keets seem to be happy about it too because they are singing every time they finish eating now. Happy Parakeets, Happy Mommy.

product_meta.title: Kaytee Fiesta For Parakeets
product_meta.description: Size:4.5 lb| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingKaytee Fiesta Parakeet food is a nutritionally fortified gourmet diet made of a premium blend of fruits, vegetables, seeds and grains offering maximum variety, fun and nutrition for pet birds. Fiesta contains prebiotics and probiotics to support digestive health and is formulated with your bird species in mind. Kaytee understands that sharing your life with a pet bird is not only enjoyable but very enriching. Kaytee shows our love by ensuring we provide your pet bird with the best nutrition for a long and healthy life. With over 150 years of nutritional experience, it's no wonder why Kaytee is at the heart of every healthy feeding routine. Not intended for human consumption
feature_bullets: Nutritionally Fortified Gourmet Food For Parakeets
Omega 3'S To Support Brain And Heart Health
Antioxidants For General Health And Immune Support
Enhances Skin And Feather Health For Vibrant, Healthy Plumage
Contains Fruits, Nuts, Veggies And Textures For Nutritional Variety
Prebiotics And Probiotics To Support Digestive Health

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
